name: clipboard-viewer
description: A sleek, minimal clipboard viewer inspired by Raycast

scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development npm run build && npm start
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/main dist/preload dist/renderer && tsc -p tsconfig.json && cp src/renderer/final.html dist/renderer/
scripts.watch: nodemon --watch src --ext ts,html,css --exec "npm run build && npm start"
